attributes.additional_details: Street Angels – CNI Network ask for action to be taken by the Department of health over the “NekNominate” dares currently trending on social media. This dangerous craze has already claimed several lives, and is pushing individuals to do more and more dangerous and potentially lethal stunts for attention. We ask that the government support positive online initiatives such a #Do1NiceThing and take action to reduce harmful online trends as they emerge.

rejection.details: Please see petition - For the Government to take action about the Neknomination game
